name: Last ship for humanity
description:
Full screen recommended

Made in 10 days for MouseJam2
With the theme Chase and the focus Mouse Only

------------------------------------------

In a distant future, humanity has been heradicated by a race of genocidal aliens.

What remains of humanity is now fleeing through space,
struggling to survive on the few resources it can gather,
all the while fighting back against the aliens chasing them.

------------- Controls ------------

L-Click : Interact

R-Click : Close menu

Scroll : Switch between menus
